interesting case. any details on how to reproduce would be good. 

Off hand guess is its one of those cases where runnables in synch que get 
their order switched (to avoid possible deadlock).

(In reply to comment #2)

I were editing a jsp page in a scriptlet block. I cannot reproduce it but 
after that problem the editor remains in a weird state:
1. any delete operation generates a NullPointerException
2. on insert operations the caret does not change its position

happens with 1.0.2rc1 as well.
it happens on my jsp files after some editing and copy'n'paste actions ...

must correct myself ....
after copying the 1.0.2rc1 into the correct ecipse folder, the npe's do not happen anymore


the log file about the problems with 1.0.1:
